title: guNDu veDittu kuruDiyODi
sahitya:
guNDu veDittuk-kurudiyODik-kulainda nALilE 
en aNDai irundE abhayam aLittAi ammaiyappanE


anupallavi

  aNDamellAm ghiDu ghiDukkum aNukkaLattilE 
Atma shaktik-kanalait-tUNDi amaidi Indanai


caraNam    kaN mUDit-tirakku munnE kATSi ulagellAm maN mUDip-
pOghum pOdOr mAyam kATTinai un malark-kai nITTinai ayyA
